\par
\f1\lang1049 (!!!!!!!!) \'cd\'e5 \'ed\'e0\'e4\'ee \'ef\'e5\'f0\'e5\'e2\'ee\'e4\'e8\'f2\'fc \'f2\'ee\'f7 \'e2 \'f2\'ee\'f7. !!!! \'cc\'ee\'e6\'ed\'ee \'ef\'f0\'ee\'f1\'f2\'ee \'e1\'f0\'e0\'f2\'fc \'e8\'e4\'e5\'e8 \'e8 \'f3\'ef\'f0\'ee\'f9\'e5\'ed\'ed\'ee \'e3\'ee\'e2\'ee\'f0\'e8\'f2\'fc. \'d6\'e5\'eb\'fc - \'ed\'e0\'f3\'f7\'e8\'f2\'fc\'f1\'ff \'e1\'fb\'f1\'f2\'f0\'ee \'e3\'ee\'e2\'ee\'f0\'e8\'f2\'fc, \'e1\'fb\'f1\'f2\'f0\'ee \'e4\'ee\'f1\'f2\'e0\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc \'f1\'eb\'ee\'e2\'e0 \'e8\'e7 \'e3\'ee\'eb\'ee\'e2\'fb, \'e1\'fb\'f1\'f2\'f0\'ee \'e8\'f1\'ef\'ee\'eb\'fc\'e7\'ee\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ef\'e0\'f2\'f2\'e5\'f0\'ed\'fb \'e8\'e7\'f3\'f7\'e0\'e5\'ec\'ee\'e3\'ee \'ff\'e7\'fb\'ea\'e0.\par
\par
\'d7\'e8\'f2\'e0\'f2\'fc \'f0\'e0\'f1\'f1\'ea\'e0\'e7, \'ef\'ee\'f2\'ee\'ec \'ef\'e5\'f0\'e5\'f1\'f1\'ea\'e0\'e7\'fb\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ed\'e0 \'e0\'ed\'e3\'eb. \'cd\'f3 \'eb\'e8\'e1\'ee \'ef\'ee \'ef\'f0\'e5\'e4\'eb\'ee\'e6\'e5\'ed\'e8\'ff\'ec.\par
\par
>>> 20-05-2021 02:03\par
\'c5\'f9\'e5 \'f0\'e0\'e7 \'f5\'ee\'f7\'e5\'f2\'f1\'ff \'ef\'ee\'e4\'f7\'e5\'f0\'ea\'ed\'f3\'f2\'fc - \'e8\'e7 \'f0\'e0\'f1\'f1\'ea\'e0\'e7\'e0 \'e1\'f0\'e0\'f2\'fc \'f2\'ee\'eb\'fc\'ea\'ee \'e8\'e4\'e5\'e8 \'e4\'eb\'ff \'f0\'e0\'f1\'f1\'ea\'e0\'e7\'e0. \'cf\'e5\'f0\'e5\'e2\'ee\'e4\'e8\'f2\'fc \'f2\'ee\'eb\'fc\'ea\'ee \'ef\'f0\'e5\'e4\'eb\'ee\'e6\'e5\'ed\'e8\'ff, \'ea\'ee\'f2\'ee\'f0\'fb\'e5 \'ec\'ee\'e6\'ed\'ee \'e2\'fb\'f0\'e0\'e7\'e8\'f2\'fc \'e8\'e7\'f3\'f7\'e0\'e5\'ec\'ee\'e9 \'ea\'ee\'ed\'f1\'f2\'f0\'f3\'ea\'f6\'e8\'e5\'e9.\par
\'c8 \'ef\'f0\'e5\'e4\'f1\'f2\'e0\'e2\'eb\'ff\'f2\'fc \'ed\'ee\'f1\'e8\'f2\'e5\'eb\'ff, \'f1 \'ea\'e5\'ec \'f5\'ee\'f7\'f3 \'ef\'ee\'e4\'e5\'eb\'e8\'f2\'fc\'f1\'ff \'e8\'ed\'f2\'e5\'f0\'e5\'f1\'ed\'ee\'e9 \'e8\'f1\'f2\'ee\'f0\'e8\'e5\'e9.\par
\'cc\'ee\'e6\'e5\'f2 \'f1\'eb\'ee\'e2\'e0, \'f1\'eb\'ee\'e2\'ee\'f1\'ee\'f7\'e5\'f2\'e0\'ed\'e8\'ff, \'e2\'fb\'f0\'e0\'e6\'e5\'ed\'e8\'ff \'f1\'ec\'ee\'f2\'f0\'ff \'e2 \'f2\'e5\'ea\'f1\'f2\'e5 \'e4\'f3\'ec\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ea\'e0\'ea \'fd\'f2\'ee \'ed\'e0 \'e0\'ed\'e3\'eb. (\'ed\'f3 \'e8 \'f2\'f3\'f0.) \'cd\'ee \'f1\'e0\'ec\'ee\'e5 \'e3\'eb\'e0\'e2\'ed\'ee\'e5 - \'f3\'ec\'e5\'f2\'fc \'e2\'fb\'e4\'e0\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc \'f1\'ea\'eb\'e5\'e8\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ec\'fb\'f1\'eb\'e8, \'ed\'e5 \'ee\'f2\'e4\'e5\'eb\'fc\'ed\'fb\'e5 \'f1\'eb\'ee\'e2\'e0. \'cf\'ee\'fd\'f2\'ec\'ee\'f3 \'e3\'eb\'ff\'e4\'ff \'e2 \'f2\'e5\'ea\'f1\'f2 \'e7\'e0\'ef\'e8\'f1\'fb\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ea\'e0\'ea\'e8\'e5 \'e0\'ed\'e3\'eb \'f1\'eb\'ee\'e2\'e0 \'ef\'f0\'e8\'f8\'eb\'e8 \'ed\'e0 \'f3\'ec. \'cf\'ee\'f2\'ee\'ec \'e8\'e7 \'ed\'e8\'f5 \'e4\'e5\'eb\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ef\'f0\'e5\'e4\'eb\'ee\'e6\'e5\'ed\'e8\'ff. \'d1\'f2\'e0\'f0\'e0\'f2\'fc\'f1\'ff \'ed\'e5 \'ef\'ee\'eb\'fc\'e7\'ee\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc\'f1\'ff \'ef\'e5\'f0\'e5\'e2\'ee\'e4\'f7\'e8\'ea\'e0\'ec\'e8.\par
\par
\par

WorkText:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1251\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1049{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset204 Roboto Condensed;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Roboto Condensed;}}

\pard\cf1\f0\fs24 >>> 19-05-2021 23:02\par
We came to\f1\lang1033  a pass and stopped.\par
\f0\lang1049 The reindeer herders began to adjust the bags on weary reindeers.\par
People gathered around the fire and had a talk about what happened that day.\par
\f1\lang1033 The sun looking like a fiery tambourine, hung over the lakes, the forest.\f0\lang1049\par
\f1\lang1033 One more day of the way and I will say goodbye to nomadic journey, gnats and quiet swamps.\par
Every traveler has \par
having satisfied in plenty fresh of air you can feel good.\f0\lang1049\par
walking on animal paths is dangerous.\par
\par
fully satisfied of coniferous smell flavored with smoke of bonfire\par
fully satisfied of nice air you came back home and enjoy talking to beloved wife.\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
===========================================================================\par
I don't know how long I had been sleeping for, when I was awaken by a hot breath into my face.\par
It was my dog Zagrya.\par
Sometimes, my dog ha\f1\lang1033 s\f0\lang1049  a desire to lie down next to me.\par
\f1\lang1033 Usually my dog looks for me among sleeping people at night and lies near to me.\par
\par
I cuddled Zagria and dragged it closer.\par
I hugged Zagria and pulled him closer to me.\par
I hugged Zagria and moved him closer me.\par
\par
I recall an interesting dog story full of adventures.\par
\par
Zagria was brought up by the angry, dominating dog Nurka.\par
\par
At that time we were working in the Olekminskaya taiga.\par
\par
\f0\lang1049\par
}
TxtContent:
### The demon of Yambuy

(!!!!!!!!) Не надо переводить точ в точ. !!!! Можно просто брать идеи и упрощенно говорить. Цель - научиться быстро говорить, быстро доставать слова из головы, быстро использовать паттерны изучаемого языка.

Читать рассказ, потом перессказывать на англ. Ну либо по предложениям.

>>> 20-05-2021 02:03
Еще раз хочется подчеркнуть - из рассказа брать только идеи для рассказа. Переводить только предложения, которые можно выразить изучаемой конструкцией.
И представлять носителя, с кем хочу поделиться интересной историей.
Может слова, словосочетания, выражения смотря в тексте думать как это на англ. (ну и тур.) Но самое главное - уметь выдавать склеивать мысли, не отдельные слова. Поэтмоу глядя в текст записывать какие англ слова пришли на ум. Потом из них делать предложения. Стараться не пользоваться переводчиками.


Подобрать словарный запас описания Нурки.

>>> 19-05-2021 22:55
